name: Don't Talk to Strangers (SirBoy)
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

The game isn't in a completed state, but I got as far as I could in the given time. There isn't a way to beat the end game as of yet.

Play as a child on a regular shopping trip with his mom... until things take a turn for the worse. View the world with an overactive imagination, seeing things that may not be reality..

WASD to move, Left Shift to sprint, Space to jump, Ctrl to crouch, Left Click to interact with objects
